Works better for narrow windows too.

data.name: Flashtrick
data.description:
Flashscore.com-alike league standings for Hattrick.org

Please keep in mind that the "Last 5" form indicator has hardcoded values of "P" (for win), "N" (for draw) and "I" (for loss).

This is a technical CSS limitation, so if you wish to modify those feel free to edit them in the source code (they are located at the very top).
